N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 502.3 - Application

State Regulations

Any fallout shelter constructed or installed or
proposed to be constructed or installed shall comply with the standards and
requirements established in the regulations governing construction, maintenance
and use of fallout shelters. Compliance with the regulations governing
construction, maintenance and use of fallout shelters shall be deemed to
accomplish the following: (a) Achievement of the minimum protection factor against radioactive
fallout. (b) Establishment of
eligibility for financial assistance from governmental sources or private
lending institutions for the construction of fallout shelters. (c) Establishment of eligibility for
exemption (1) from local taxation of those portions of off-street parking
facilities providing underground shelter; and (2) from real property taxation, special ad valorem levies, and special assessment on fallout shelter facilities
as provided respectively in sections
478
and
479
of the Real Property Tax Law, as
amended. (d) Establishment of
eligibility for State Civil Defense Aid for fallout shelter
occupancies. Notes
